name: Fix It Please!
description:
Use your mouse and move the Pixel Helper over the dying pixels! Quickly save them before they become dead pixels.

New to Game Dev and decided to try this week's game jam. The game is missing levels and health. There's a counter I've added as a type of score. 
The "collectibles" were time consuming to recreate and so in the next type of project I will work on that. 

Created using Godot and GDscript. 
I found the background and start menu from the internet all other graphics I created. Sounds were purchased in a Humble Bundle for 8 bit game dev.
